data.title: I regret divorcing Robert Kardashian: Kris Jenner
meta_keywords: I regret divorcing Robert Kardashian: Kris Jenner
data.meta_description:
Reality TV star Kris Jenner, who recently seperated from husband Bruce Jenner after 22-years of marriage, says her only regret is divorcing her first husband Robert Kardashian.
	The 57-year-old socialite, who has four children with Robert -- Kourtney, Kim, Khloe and son Rob --, divorced the late lawyer in 1991, according to New You magazine.
	Kris married former Olympian Bruce in 1991, with whom she has has four stepchildren. They couple also have two daughters together, Kendall and Kylie.
	"The one regret, if I had to do it over, would be divorcing Robert Kardashian. But then there wouldn't have been Kendall and Kylie, so that's the way I look at it," Kris said.
	"Everything happens for a reason, and we learn from our mistakes. I thought I was so smart when I was young; I was fearless," she added.
	The 'Keeping Up with the Kardashian' star remained close to Robert as a friend till his death in 2003 due to cancer.
	Kris thinks her daughter Khloe, who is in the midst of marital woes ...
